short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display total price of items on eBay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for eBay that shows the total price for items, combining the base price and the shipping price. It also includes a filter to only show items with a total price within a range you define.
